Uses of Interface
opendial.domains.rules.conditions.Condition

  • Packages that use Condition 
    Package Description
    opendial.domains.rules  
    opendial.domains.rules.conditions  

    • Uses of Condition in opendial.domains.rules

      Methods in opendial.domains.rules that return Condition 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Condition RuleCase.getCondition()
      Returns the condition for the case
      Methods in opendial.domains.rules with parameters of type Condition 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RuleCase.setCondition(Condition condition)
      Sets the condition for the case (if a condition is already specified, it is erased)
      Constructors in opendial.domains.rules with parameters of type Condition 
      Constructor and Description
      RuleCase(Condition condition)
      Creates a new case, with the given condition and an empty list of effects

    • Uses of Condition in opendial.domains.rules.conditions

      Classes in opendial.domains.rules.conditions that implement Condition 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicCondition
      Basic condition between a variable and a value
      class  ComplexCondition
      Complex condition made up of a collection of sub-conditions connected with a logical operator (AND, OR).
      class  NegatedCondition
      Negated condition, which is satisfied when the included condition is not.
      class  VoidCondition
      Representation of a void condition, which is always true.
      Methods in opendial.domains.rules.conditions that return Condition 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Condition NegatedCondition.getInitCondition()
      Returns the condition to negate
      Methods in opendial.domains.rules.conditions with parameters of type Condition 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ComplexCondition.addCondition(Condition condition)
      Adds a new subcondition to the complex condition
      void ComplexCondition.removeCondition(Condition condition)
      Removes the subcondition to the complex condition (if it exists)
      Constructors in opendial.domains.rules.conditions with parameters of type Condition 
      Constructor and Description
      ComplexCondition(Condition... subconditions)
      Creates a new complex condition with a list of subconditions
      NegatedCondition(Condition initCondition)
      Creates a new negated condition with the condition provided as argument
      Constructor parameters in opendial.domains.rules.conditions with type arguments of type Condition 
      Constructor and Description
      ComplexCondition(java.util.List<Condition> subconditions)
      Creates a new complex condition with a list of subconditions
